title: Aura of cancer as an additional passive
body:
I think we can all relate (except mains) that this game would be a lot more fun if {{champion:64}} and {{champion:157}} were gutted. People say that no champion deserves to be gutted; I disagree. When a champion gets a passive _aura of cancer_, we have a  problem. 

The problem with this _aura of cancer_ is that it basically empowers the champion, yet is not considered a passive ability by Riot. The question becomes: why is this cancerous aura not considered a part of the champions kit? 

{{champion:99}} sees {{champion:157}} gets locked in - automatically tilts and recieves debuff: **Aura of cancer**: _This champions cancerous presence disempowers and tilts you until you lose._

My suggestion: Make this ability explicit and nerf/buff accordingly. {{champion:64}} and {{champion:157}} would be on top of my list, since Yas in specific now has three passives.

Just my 2 cents. This is not a joke.
